keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and MUJIB MASHAL
byline.contributor: Rod Nordland reported from Brussels, and Mujib Mashal from Kabul, Afghanistan. Reporting was contributed by Najim Rahim, Jawad Sukhanyar, Zahra Nader and Fahim Abed from Kabul; Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan; and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of Afghans could be deported in the deal, just as the Taliban war has intensified, killing and wounding more civilians than ever.

headline.print_headline: E.U. to Force Afghans Back to War Zone
headline.main: Europe Makes Deal to Send Afghans Home, Where War Awaits Them

snippet: Tens of thousands of Afghans could be deported in the deal, just as the Taliban war has intensified, killing and wounding more civilians than ever....
